content.raw:
This logic is repeated below for meshes. What do you think of moving this to a function? Something like:

`void BoxToCylinder(const ignition::math::Box &_box, double &_radius, double &_length, ignition::math::Quaternion &_rot)`

Where `_radius`, `_length` and `_rot` are output params.

In the future, it may be useful to move this to Ignition Math and use the new [ignition::math::Cylinder](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/7c83076419cf11404e5bfa2b5683b4a08c863918/include/ignition/math/Cylinder.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) class.
